bucket.translation[0].definitions[0].def: an open container with a handle, used for carrying and holding things, especially liquids
bucket.translation[0].definitions[1].def: the quantity of liquid that a bucket can hold
bucket.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a part of a machine shaped like a large bucket and used for moving earth, water etc
bucket.translation[0].definitions[3].exa: They were drinking beer by the bucket.
They made buckets of cash on the deal.
